channel.title: 🏢 University of South Carolina on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Visual Counter Turing Test (VCT^2): Discovering the Challenges for AI-Generated Image Detection and Introducing Visual AI Index (V_AI)
item.description: New benchmark VCT² reveals limitations of AI-generated image detectors; Visual AI Index (VAI) provides a robust evaluation framework.
